hotel name: The best known village of Belgium
pos review: Very friendly host. Very clean. We liked it a lot!

hotel name: The best known village of Belgium
pos review: Beautyful b&b. Thank's for owner Paul for the late check in.

hotel name: The best known village of Belgium
pos review: Nice and friendly staff..warm and confortable bed
neg review: Parking spaces is a problem if you are coming late

hotel name: The best known village of Belgium
neg review: The shared bathroom is in another floor, and you can only access the bathroom using a very step staircase not suitable for old people. There is no external info indicating that this was a pension. In reality that's not a pension but a particular home, where you "live" with the owners.

hotel name: The best known village of Belgium
pos review: The owner personally made super fresh and tasty breakfast. Quiet and warm room, good pillows. The location is 100m from famous Duvel beer brewery.
neg review: Google maps navigates to wrong place. But the owner was kind to find us and show the route.

hotel name: The best known village of Belgium
pos review:
Friendly staff, nice House and a Comfortable bed!
Everything was available in the room and they make it comfortable for you.
neg review: Pretty dark stairs and hard to see.

hotel name: The best known village of Belgium
neg review: If you go on saturday or Sunday it's imposible to get there.
